image.img: => `<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' width='100px' height='100px' version='1.1'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' stroke='${color}' stroke-width='${width}' fill-opacity='0.2' fill='${color}' /><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='30' stroke='${color}' stroke-width='${width}' fill='none' /><line x1='25' y1='40' x2='75' y2='40' stroke='${color}' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-width='${width}' /><line x1='25' y1='60' x2='75' y2='60' stroke='${color}' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-width='${width}' /></svg>`
